meanings.definition: A device or system that generates random numbers or selections.
meanings.sent1: The randomizers in the game determine the outcome of each turn.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used a randomizers to select participants for the study.
meanings.sent3: The randomizers at the carnival kept picking the same number over and over!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a randomizers, constantly producing unpredictable thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The randomizers hummed softly as it selected the next winner.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that randomizes or makes something random.
meanings.sent1: The randomizers in the group always kept things interesting.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the office randomizers, always changing up the routine.
meanings.sent3: The randomizers of the family, he loved surprising everyone with unexpected gifts.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a randomizers, never knowing what would come out next.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush acted as a randomizers, creating unique patterns on the canvas.
